mcq.statement: As per the Case of Miss Asma Jillani vs Government of Pakistan (PLD 1972 S.C 139), the precise question the Supreme Court was whether the High Courts had jurisdiction under Article 98 of the _____ to enquire into the validity of detention under the Martial Law Regulation No. 78 of 1971 in view of the bar created by the provisions of jurisdiction of Courts (Removal of Doubts) Order 1969.
